<a id="VisualShaderNodeColorConstant"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeColorConstant

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNodeConstant](VisualShaderNodeConstant.md) **\<** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A [Color](Color.md) constant to be used within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Has two output ports representing RGB and alpha channels of [Color](Color.md).

Translated to ``vec3 rgb`` and ``float alpha`` in the shader language.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->
